abstract: Professor Cornel West was among 30 demonstrators who were arrested at a protest of warrantless stops by the New York Police Department.
snippet: Professor Cornel West was among 30 demonstrators who were arrested at a protest of warrantless stops by the New York Police Department.
lead_paragraph: About 30 people, including the civil rights campaigner and Princeton professor Cornel West, were arrested Friday outside a police station in Harlem during a protest of the police practice known as stop-and-frisk.

headline.main: Protesters of Police Stop-and-Frisk Practice Are Arrested
